about.title: About Me
about.description:
I’m Federico Roma, world champion in Muay Thai and Kickboxing. With over 20 years of experience, I trained in Thailand, represented Argentina in international fights, and I'm known for my aggressive, respectful, and technical style.

I currently focus on training, competing, and teaching new athletes through classes and seminars worldwide.
